DOC.detailed_description: This project create prospective registry 3,000 patient follow-ups 5 year . The aim project : 1. identify plaque characteristic OCT associate adverse cardiac event include myocardial infarction 2. identify characteristic stented artery associate adverse event include restenosis stent thrombosis Because detailed clinical , angiographic intravascular image data gather large number patient clinical follow-up , anticipate registry tremendous resource additional research question go forward .
